question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the technology industry over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Gather social media engagement data for the identified technology companies from the SocialMediaInfo table, filtering for entries from the last year.
Compile detailed Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube engagement metrics from the respective social media detail tables, ensuring all relevant posts are included in the analysis.
Aggregate and analyze the combined social media metrics to identify trends, peaks in engagement, and overall growth patterns for the technology companies over the last year.
